verses.verse: <S%G2532>Then<s%> the <S%G5330>Pharisees,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5100>some<s%> of the <S%G1122>scribes<s%> gathered <S%G4863>together<s%> <S%G4314>to<s%> <S%G846>him,<s%> having <S%G2064>come<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G2414>Jerusalem.<s%>

<S%G2532>Now<s%> when they <S%G1492>saw<s%> <S%G5100>some<s%> <S%G3101>of<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3101>disciples<s%> <S%G2068>eating<s%> <S%G740>bread<s%> <S%G5495>with<s%> <S%G2839>defiled,<s%> <S%G5124>that<s%> <S%G2076>is,<s%> <S%G449>unwashed,<s%> <S%G5495>hands,<s%> they found <S%G3201>fault.<s%>

<S%G1063>(For<s%> the <S%G5330>Pharisees,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G2453>Jews,<s%> <S%G2068>don't<s%> eat <S%G1437>unless<s%> they <S%G3538>wash<s%> their <S%G5495>hands<s%> and <S%G4435>forearms,<s%> <S%G2902>holding<s%> to the <S%G3862>tradition<s%> of the <S%G4245>elders.<s%>

<S%G2532>They<s%> <S%G3756>don't<s%> <S%G2068>eat<s%> when they come <S%G575>from<s%> the <S%G58>marketplace,<s%> <S%G3362>unless<s%> <S%G3361><s%> they <S%G907>bathe<s%> <S%G2532>themselves,<s%> and there <S%G2076>are<s%> <S%G4183>many<s%> other <S%G243>things,<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> they have <S%G3880>received<s%> to <S%G2902>hold<s%> <S%G909>to:<s%> washings of <S%G4221>cups,<s%> <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3582>pitchers,<s%> <S%G2532><s%> bronze <S%G5473>vessels,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2825>couches.<s%>)

<S%G1899>The<s%> <S%G5330>Pharisees<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G1122>scribes<s%> <S%G1905>asked<s%> <S%G1223>him,<s%> <S%G5101>"Why<s%> <S%G3756>don't<s%> <S%G4675>your<s%> <S%G3101>disciples<s%> <S%G4043>walk<s%> according <S%G2596>to<s%> the <S%G3862>tradition<s%> of the <S%G4245>elders,<s%> <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G2068>eat<s%> their <S%G740>bread<s%> <S%G5495>with<s%> <S%G449>unwashed<s%> <S%G5495>hands?<s%>"

<S%G1161>He<s%> <S%G611>answered<s%> <S%G3754>them,<s%> <S%G2573>"Well<s%> <S%G4395>did<s%> <S%G2268>Isaiah<s%> <S%G4395>prophesy<s%> <S%G4012>of<s%> <S%G5216>you<s%> <S%G5273>hypocrites,<s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> it is <S%G1125>written,<s%> <S%G3778><s%> 'This <S%G2992>people<s%> <S%G5091>honors<s%> <S%G3165>me<s%> <S%G5491>with<s%> their <S%G5491>lips,<s%> <S%G1161>but<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G2588>heart<s%> <S%G568>is<s%> <S%G4206>far<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G1700>me.<s%>
<S%G1161>But<s%> in <S%G3155>vain<s%> do they <S%G4576>worship<s%> <S%G3165>me,<s%> <S%G1321>teaching<s%> as <S%G1319>doctrines<s%> the <S%G1778>commandments<s%> of <S%G444>men.<s%>'

<S%G1063>"For<s%> you set <S%G863>aside<s%> the <S%G1785>commandment<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%> and <S%G2902>hold<s%> tightly to the <S%G3862>tradition<s%> of <S%G444>men<s%>â€” the <S%G909>washing<s%> of <S%G3582>pitchers<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4221>cups,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> you <S%G4160>do<s%> <S%G4183>many<s%> <S%G243>other<s%> <S%G5108>such<s%> <S%G3946>things.<s%>"

<S%G2532>He<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to <S%G846>them,<s%> "Full <S%G2573>well<s%> do you <S%G114>reject<s%> the <S%G1785>commandment<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> you may <S%G5083>keep<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G3862>tradition.<s%>

<S%G1063>For<s%> <S%G3475>Moses<s%> <S%G2036>said,<s%> <S%G5091><s%> 'Honor <S%G4675>your<s%> <S%G3962>father<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4675>your<s%> <S%G3384>mother;<s%>' <S%G2532>and,<s%> <S%G2551><s%> 'He who speaks evil of <S%G3962>father<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G3384>mother,<s%> let him be <S%G5053>put<s%> to <S%G5053>death.<s%>'

<S%G1161>But<s%> <S%G5210>you<s%> <S%G3004>say,<s%> <S%G1437><s%> 'If a <S%G444>man<s%> <S%G2036>tells<s%> his <S%G3962>father<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> his <S%G3384>mother,<s%> <S%G1437>"Whatever<s%> <S%G5623>profit<s%> you might have <S%G1537>received<s%> <S%G1537>from<s%> <S%G1700>me<s%> is <S%G2878>Corban,<s%> <S%G3739>that<s%> is to <S%G2076>say,<s%> given to <S%G1435>God;<s%>"'

<S%G2532>then<s%> you no <S%G3765>longer<s%> <S%G863>allow<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> to <S%G4160>do<s%> <S%G3762>anything<s%> <S%G3962>for<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3962>father<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3384>mother,<s%>

<S%G208>making<s%> <S%G208>void<s%> the <S%G3056>word<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> by <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G3862>tradition,<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> you have <S%G3860>handed<s%> <S%G2532>down.<s%> You <S%G4160>do<s%> <S%G4183>many<s%> <S%G3946>things<s%> like <S%G4160>this.<s%>"

<S%G2532>He<s%> <S%G4341>called<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G3793>multitude<s%> to <S%G3004>himself,<s%> and said to <S%G846>them,<s%> <S%G191>"Hear<s%> <S%G3450>me,<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> of <S%G2532>you,<s%> and <S%G4920>understand.<s%>

There <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G3762>nothing<s%> from <S%G1855>outside<s%> of the <S%G444>man,<s%> <S%G3739>that<s%> <S%G1531>going<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G1410>can<s%> <S%G2840>defile<s%> <S%G846>him;<s%> <S%G235>but<s%> the things which proceed <S%G1607>out<s%> <S%G575>of<s%> the <S%G846>man<s%> are <S%G1565>those<s%> <S%G2076>that<s%> <S%G2840>defile<s%> the <S%G444>man.<s%>
<S%G1487>If<s%> <S%G5100>anyone<s%> <S%G2192>has<s%> <S%G3775>ears<s%> to <S%G191>hear,<s%> let him <S%G191>hear!<s%>"

<S%G3753>When<s%> he had <S%G1525>entered<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> a <S%G3624>house<s%> away <S%G575>from<s%> the <S%G3793>multitude,<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3101>disciples<s%> <S%G1905>asked<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G4012>about<s%> the <S%G3850>parable.<s%>

<S%G2532>He<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to <S%G846>them,<s%> <S%G2075>"Are<s%> <S%G5210>you<s%> <S%G3779>thus<s%> without <S%G801>understanding<s%> <S%G2532>also?<s%> <S%G3756>Don't<s%> <S%G3539>you<s%> <S%G3539>perceive<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G3956>whatever<s%> <S%G1531>goes<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G444>man<s%> from <S%G1855>outside<s%> <S%G1410><s%> <S%G3756>can't<s%> <S%G2840>defile<s%> <S%G846>him,<s%>

<S%G3754>because<s%> it <S%G3756>doesn't<s%> <S%G1531>go<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G2588>heart,<s%> <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> his <S%G2836>stomach,<s%> <S%G2532%G99999>then<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G856>latrine,<s%> thus <S%G2511>purifying<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G1033>foods?<s%>"
He <S%G3754>said,<s%> "That which proceeds <S%G1607>out<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> the <S%G444>man,<s%> <S%G1565>that<s%> <S%G2840>defiles<s%> the <S%G444>man.<s%>

<S%G1063>For<s%> from <S%G2081>within,<s%> <S%G1537>out<s%> of the <S%G2588>hearts<s%> of <S%G444>men,<s%> <S%G1607>proceed<s%> <S%G2556>evil<s%> <S%G1261>thoughts,<s%> <S%G3430>adulteries,<s%> sexual <S%G4202>sins,<s%> <S%G5408>murders,<s%> <S%G2829>thefts,<s%>

<S%G4124>covetings,<s%> <S%G4189>wickedness,<s%> <S%G1388>deceit,<s%> lustful <S%G766>desires,<s%> <S%G3788>an<s%> <S%G4190>evil<s%> <S%G3788>eye,<s%> <S%G988>blasphemy,<s%> <S%G5243>pride,<s%> and <S%G877>foolishness.<s%>
<S%G3956>All<s%> <S%G5023>these<s%> evil <S%G4190>things<s%> <S%G1607>come<s%> from <S%G2081>within,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2840>defile<s%> the <S%G444>man.<s%>"

<S%G2532>From<s%> <S%G1564>there<s%> he <S%G450>arose,<s%> and <S%G565>went<s%> away <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G3181>borders<s%> of <S%G5184>Tyre<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4605>Sidon.<s%> <S%G2532>He<s%> <S%G1525>entered<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> a <S%G3614>house,<s%> and <S%G2309>didn't<s%> want <S%G3762>anyone<s%> to <S%G1097>know<s%> <S%G2532>it,<s%> but <S%G1410>he<s%> <S%G3756>couldn't<s%> escape <S%G2990>notice.<s%>

<S%G1063>For<s%> <S%G1135>a<s%> <S%G1135>woman,<s%> <S%G3739>whose<s%> little <S%G2365>daughter<s%> <S%G2192>had<s%> <S%G4151>an<s%> <S%G169>unclean<s%> <S%G4151>spirit,<s%> <S%G2192>having<s%> <S%G191>heard<s%> <S%G4012>of<s%> <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G2064>came<s%> and <S%G4363>fell<s%> down <S%G4314>at<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G4228>feet.<s%>

Now the <S%G1135>woman<s%> <S%G2258>was<s%> a <S%G1674>Greek,<s%> a <S%G4949>Syrophoenician<s%> by <S%G1085>race.<s%> <S%G2532>She<s%> <S%G2065>begged<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> he would <S%G1544>cast<s%> the <S%G1140>demon<s%> <S%G1544>out<s%> <S%G2364>of<s%> <S%G846>her<s%> <S%G2364>daughter.<s%>

<S%G1161>But<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> to <S%G846>her,<s%> <S%G863>"Let<s%> the <S%G5043>children<s%> be <S%G5526>filled<s%> <S%G4412>first,<s%> <S%G1063>for<s%> it <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G2570>appropriate<s%> to <S%G2983>take<s%> the <S%G5043>children<s%>'s <S%G740>bread<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G906>throw<s%> it to the <S%G2952>dogs.<s%>"

<S%G1161>But<s%> she <S%G611>answered<s%> <S%G2532%G99999><s%> <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G3483>"Yes,<s%> <S%G2532>Lord.<s%> <S%G1063>Yet<s%> even the <S%G2952>dogs<s%> <S%G5270>under<s%> the <S%G5132>table<s%> <S%G2068>eat<s%> <S%G575>the<s%> <S%G3813>children<s%>'s <S%G5589>crumbs.<s%>"

<S%G2532>He<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> to <S%G846>her,<s%> <S%G1223>"For<s%> <S%G5126>this<s%> <S%G3056>saying,<s%> go your <S%G5217>way.<s%> The <S%G1140>demon<s%> has gone <S%G1831>out<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G4675>your<s%> <S%G2364>daughter.<s%>"

<S%G2532>She<s%> <S%G565>went<s%> away <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G846>her<s%> <S%G3624>house,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2147>found<s%> the <S%G2364>child<s%> having been <S%G906>laid<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> the <S%G2825>bed,<s%> with the <S%G1140>demon<s%> gone <S%G1831>out.<s%>

<S%G2532><s%> <S%G3825>Again<s%> he <S%G1831>departed<s%> <S%G1537>from<s%> the <S%G3725>borders<s%> of <S%G5184>Tyre<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4605>Sidon,<s%> and <S%G2064>came<s%> <S%G4314>to<s%> the <S%G2281>sea<s%> of <S%G1056>Galilee,<s%> <S%G303>through<s%> the <S%G3319>midst<s%> of the <S%G3725>region<s%> of <S%G1179>Decapolis.<s%>

<S%G2532>They<s%> <S%G5342>brought<s%> to <S%G846>him<s%> one who was <S%G2974>deaf<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> had an impediment in his <S%G3424>speech.<s%> They <S%G3870>begged<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G2443>to<s%> <S%G2007>lay<s%> his <S%G5495>hand<s%> <S%G2007>on<s%> <S%G846>him.<s%>

<S%G2532>He<s%> <S%G618>took<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G2596>aside<s%> <S%G2398><s%> <S%G575>from<s%> the <S%G3793>multitude,<s%> <S%G906>privately,<s%> and put <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G1147>fingers<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3775>ears,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> he <S%G4429>spat,<s%> and <S%G680>touched<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G1100>tongue.<s%>

<S%G2532>Looking<s%> <S%G308>up<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G3772>heaven,<s%> he <S%G4727>sighed,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G2188>"Ephphatha!<s%>" <S%G3739>that<s%> <S%G2076>is,<s%> "Be <S%G1272>opened!<s%>"

<S%G2532><s%> <S%G2112>Immediately<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G189>ears<s%> were <S%G1272>opened,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G1199>impediment<s%> <S%G1100>of<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G1100>tongue<s%> was <S%G3089>released,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> he <S%G2980>spoke<s%> <S%G3723>clearly.<s%>

<S%G2532>He<s%> <S%G1291>commanded<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> they should <S%G2036>tell<s%> no <S%G3367>one,<s%> <S%G1161>but<s%> the <S%G3745>more<s%> <S%G846>he<s%> <S%G1291>commanded<s%> <S%G846>them,<s%> so much the <S%G3123>more<s%> <S%G4054>widely<s%> they proclaimed <S%G2784>it.<s%>

<S%G2532>They<s%> <S%G1605>were<s%> <S%G1605>astonished<s%> beyond <S%G5249>measure,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> "He has <S%G4160>done<s%> all <S%G3956>things<s%> <S%G2573>well.<s%> He <S%G4160>makes<s%> <S%G2532>even<s%> the <S%G2974>deaf<s%> <S%G191>hear,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G216>mute<s%> <S%G2980>speak!<s%>"
